abstract.text: A definition of the relationships between calendar units and absolute points in time, providing features for calculation and comparison of dates.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: encapsulates information about systems of reckoning time in which the beginning, length, and divisions of a year are defined. It provides information about the calendar and support for calendrical computations such as determining the range of a given calendrical unit and adding units to a given absolute time.

abstract.text: A definition of the relationships between calendar units and absolute points in time, providing features for calculation and comparison of dates.
Returns, for a given absolute time, the ordinal number of a smaller calendar component (such as a day) within a specified larger calendar component (such as a week).
